data.name: Costume Party
data.detailed_description:
Travel through time and space, to be with the girls you’ve only dreamt about!
Visit a distant desert, slay a stormy sea, take a walk on the wild side…
Is it really happening, or is it just your fantasy?

There’s never been a Costume Party like this before!
How did you get to this crazy hotel in the first place?
What powers do these girls have, to make you feel transported?
It’s all so very confusing, but I’m not complaining!

  • Venture into a ‘Quickie’ experience, to just be thrown into the fun!
  • For those of you craving more control, feel free to explore ‘Custom’ mode!
  • Of course virtual reality is supported! Don’t be silly! Isn’t VR real anyway?
  • Or play old-school style, with just your mouse and keyboard! How about that!
  • We promise to update this game regularly, with more characters! We really do!

And how do I leave this Hotel? I’m not back in California again, am I?

data.short_description: Imagine a party, where you travel through time and space, to be with the girls you’ve only dreamt about! Visit a distant desert, slay the sea, walk the wildside. Is it really happening, or is it just your fantasy?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD R9 390 equivalent or greater
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5-6500 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or AMD R9 390 equivalent or greater

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game features nudity, adult language, consensual sex and playful spanking.  All the characters in the game are 18 years old and over.
